info.name: rarbg - dark fb
info.description: dark style for rarbg. real clean. i use this in addition to my userscript at https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/370681-rarbg-improved the script just puts cursor focus on search input box, changes category links to sort by seeders, and searches for 1080 in applicable categories
info.additionalInfo:
v1.4.2: added more domains

v1.4.1: added more domains

v1.4: added domain and fixed home page

v1.3: fixed media info

v1.2: added domains

v1.1: fixed comments and removed duplicate search categories at bottom of results page

v1.0: really revamped it and took out anything remotely unnecessary, moved the nav bar to the top and other things

v0.2: fixed visted link color, removed bloat (footer, suggested torrents), fixed media info as best as i could
